name: Grappling beans!
description:
You're a bean grappling in the city living life large!  

TIP: touch a bean and it will be sent to ______. 

(you need unzip files and when you launch click" MORE INFO then run anyway") 

CONTROLS = WASD/Up, Down, Left, Right to move. Left click is left hand grapple and Right click is right hand grapple. Left shift is crouch. R is restart.
